titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the child tax credit to $2,000 per child and make such credit refundable.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/21/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase the child tax credit from $500 to $2,000; (2) make such credit refundable; and (3) remove the limitation based on adjusted gross income for such credit.
